description: Try our easy to follow Caramel Popcorn Ice-Cream Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caramel Popcorn Ice-Cream Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 ml salted caramel & fudge ice cream

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, transfer to cake stand. Top with reserved popcorn and spoon over caramel sauce.
